sentences.sentence: I am an old man, grown weary of this world and its treacheries.
sentences.translation: 我只是个对背信弃义与充斥着欺诈的世界感到疲倦的老人。

sentences.sentence: Protect him from the treacheries of evil men and grant him strength to 'smite the servants of the dark.
sentences.translation: 求你保护他免于恶人的背叛，赐予他力量打败黑暗的仆从。

sentences.sentence: His choice had been to stay in the deep dark water far out beyond all snares and traps and treacheries.
sentences.translation: 它选择的是待在黑暗的深水里，远远地避开一切圈套、罗网和诡计。
